reasoning: JOSD (also Adult-Onset Still Disease or AOSD) is a rare systemic inflammatory disorder with incidence estimated at approximately 0.1-0.16 per 100k person-years globally. Using midpoint estimate of 0.14 per 100k based on European and Asian population studies.
source: Yamaguchi M et al. (2016). Adult-onset Still disease: A review of the literature. J Rheum Dis. 23(3):368-377
